name: The Adventure of TED PC
description:
The Adventure of TED is a  casual 2,5D Low poly Platformer Adventure game, TED searches for the lost magic crystals, the magic crystals source life of the squirrel's kingdom

• Consists of 31 levels

• Fight giant boss

• Cool cinematic and action

• Items or Secret to find and collect

• Unlock All Achievements

• Compatible Play with wireless Xbox or Playstation controller

Classic 2.5D Platformer Adventure game from RgamesID, Bringing you a nostalgic look to the Golden age era of world console games with 3D Low poly Graphics,
